Treasure Hunt

Embark on a thrilling adventure to uncover hidden clues and solve puzzles to find the ultimate treasure!

About the Event

  • Treasure Hunt is an exciting and competitive event where teams embark on a thrilling adventure to uncover hidden clues and solve puzzles to reach the ultimate treasure.
  • Each team is guided by a unique theme given on the spot, testing their problem-solving skills, teamwork, and creativity.

Event Details

  • Theme Reveal: Teams will receive a unique theme just before the event begins to guide them through the hunt.
  • Hunt and Puzzle Solving: Teams of 4 work together, moving through checkpoints and solving clues to progress.
  • Final Treasure: The team that successfully solves all clues and reaches the final treasure wins first.

Rules & Regulations

  • Each team must consist of 4 members.
  • A maximum of 1 team per college is allowed.
  • Teams must stay together and are required to follow clues sequentially.
  • Cheating or tampering with clues will lead to immediate disqualification.
  • Safety guidelines must be followed at all times.

Judging Criteria

  • Efficiency: Time taken to complete the hunt.
  • Accuracy: Correctly solving each clue.
  • Teamwork: Collaboration and coordination within the team.
